files.name: dependency_sync.sh
files.content:
#!/bin/bash

projects=(
    "<os></os>/<pc></pc>/Core/<sc></sc>"
    "<os></os>/<pc></pc>/Adaptadores/<sc></sc>-adapters"
    "<os></os>/<pc></pc>/Montadores/<sc></sc>-assemblers"
    "<os></os>/<pc></pc>/Provisionadores/<sc></sc>-rest-endpoint-dispatchers"
)
